ASK: ^Townsfolk: I don't know! Everything was just fine, then suddenly I heard a shreak, a very loud shreak coming from the cemetary
^Townsfolk: And then the monsters broke out! They attacked everyone! It was horrible!

c-0: ^Calm down, tell me where the cemetary is.
^Townsfolk: It's just down the road, near the town's church...
^Townsfolk: Yes... It's always been a sacred ground... Father always rang the bell every weekend to repell the evils. But since last week nobody had seen Father anymore. I wonder where did he go?...
^You know that you have to go to the church to find out what happened
